oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The |xam smell the poison which is warm and burns their nostrils. 'Grass Bushmen's' poison is a golden colour, 'Flat Bushmen's' poison is from a thorny bush or tree with a milky juice, and 'Flat Bushmen' also use snake venom as poison. 1) This story is found in Book II-7.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Flat Bushmen's' poison
